text: Sally Ann Struthers (born July 28, 1947) is an American actress, and activist. Her most famous acting was in the classic television series All in the Family. Struthers also acted in many movies and other television programs. Struthers also plays Babette in the television series Gilmore Girls. She also provided the voices for animated characters in television cartoon programs. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Portland, Oregon
title: Sally Struthers
